formIntro: Fill out the form below to see the fields populated in the PDF on the right. Educational tooltips are available to guide you.
docTypeTooltip: Select the type of document you are scanning.
uploadDocTooltip: Upload an image of your business card or driver's license.
creditLineTooltip: Enter the desired credit line, between $5,000 and $100,000.
businessNameTooltip: The full legal name of the business as it appears on formation documents.
businessAddressTooltip: The physical street address of the business.
cityTooltip: The city for the business address.
stateTooltip: The state for the business address.
zipTooltip: The zip code for the business address.
mailingAddressTooltip: The mailing address for the business, if different from the physical address.
mailingCityTooltip: The city for the mailing address.
mailingStateTooltip: The state for the mailing address.
mailingZipTooltip: The zip code for the mailing address.
businessPhoneTooltip: The primary phone number for the business.
primaryBankTooltip: The primary bank the business uses.
branchLocationTooltip: The location of the primary bank branch.
dateOfOriginTooltip: The date the business was founded.
yearsInBusinessTooltip: The number of years the business has been in operation.
numEmployeesTooltip: The number of employees in the business.
fullNameTooltip: The full legal name of the primary applicant.
title: Title
titleTooltip: The applicant's official title within the business.
ssnTooltip: The applicant's Social Security Number or Individual Taxpayer Identification Number.
applicantCityTooltip: The city for the applicant's home address.
applicantStateTooltip: The state for the applicant's home address.
applicantZipTooltip: The zip code for the applicant's home address.
fullNameTooltip2: The full legal name of the second applicant.
nameOnCardTooltip: Full name of the authorized cardholder.
cityCardholderTooltip: The city for the cardholder's home address.
stateCardholderTooltip: The state for the cardholder's home address.
zipCardholderTooltip: The zip code for the cardholder's home address.
creditorNameTooltip1: Name of the creditor for the first balance transfer.
accountNumberTooltip1: Account number for the first balance transfer.
remittanceAddressTooltip1: Remittance address for the first balance transfer.
creditorNameTooltip2: Name of the creditor for the second balance transfer.
accountNumberTooltip2: Account number for the second balance transfer.
remittanceAddressTooltip2: Remittance address for the second balance transfer.
creditorNameTooltip3: Name of the creditor for the third balance transfer.
accountNumberTooltip3: Account number for the third balance transfer.
remittanceAddressTooltip3: Remittance address for the third balance transfer.
individualNameTooltip: Name of an individual who owns 25% or more of the equity interests.
controllingPersonTooltip: An individual with significant responsibility for managing the legal entity (e.g., CEO, CFO, President).
titleInOrgTooltip: The official title of the controlling person.
emailModalInstructions: Create a password to encrypt your form data. This password will be required to unlock and view the data later. The data is stored securely in the link itself.
emailLinkInstructions: Your secure link is ready. Click the link to open it in your default email client. Remember to share the password separately.
